TITLE: Creating New Pool with Custom Capacity DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a new goroutine pool with a specified capacity of 10000 SOURCE: https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/blob/dev/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: go CODE: ``` p, _ := ants.NewPool(10000) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Submitting Tasks to Pool DESCRIPTION: Example of submitting a function to be executed by the goroutine pool SOURCE: https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/blob/dev/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: go CODE: ``` ants.Submit(func(){}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tuning Pool Capacity DESCRIPTION: Examples of dynamically adjusting the pool capacity at runtime SOURCE: https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/blob/dev/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: go CODE: ``` pool.Tune(1000) // Tune its capacity to 1000 pool.Tune(100000) // Tune its capacity to 100000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pre-allocating Pool Memory DESCRIPTION: Creating a pool with pre-allocated memory for better performance in specific scenarios SOURCE: https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/blob/dev/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: go CODE: ``` // ants will pre-malloc the whole capacity of pool when calling ants.NewPool. p, _ := ants.NewPool(100000, ants.WithPreAlloc(true)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rebooting Pool DESCRIPTION: Example of rebooting a previously released pool to make it usable again SOURCE: https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/blob/dev/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: go CODE: ``` // A pool that has been released can be still used after calling the Reboot(). pool.Reboot() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Releasing Pool Resources DESCRIPTION: Examples of releasing pool resources with and without timeout SOURCE: https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/blob/dev/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: go CODE: ``` pool.Release() // or pool.ReleaseTimeout(time.Second * 3) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Ants v2 DESCRIPTION: Command to install version 2 of the Ants library with Go modules enabled SOURCE: https://github.com/panjf2000/ants/blob/dev/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: powershell CODE: ``` go get -u github.com/panjf2000/ants/v2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Ants v1 DESCRIPTION: Command to install version 1 of the Ants
